subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Who knows how the 37th Ryder Cup Championship will end, but the United States had to be pleased with the way it began, ahead 3 points to 1 in morning play for the first time since 1991.
snippet: Who knows how the 37th Ryder Cup Championship will end, but the United States had to be pleased with the way it began, ahead 3 points to 1 in morning play for the first time since 1991.
